message:
Great! I found a pepperoni pizza for AED 43.0 on our menu. Would you like to place an order for this item? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel.

If you're ready to order, please provide me with your RFID number (6 digits - located at the back bottom right of your NYU card after the + sign), building number (from the options: "A1A", "A1B", "A1C", "A2A", "A2B", "A2C", "A3", "A4", "A5A", "A5B", "A5C", "A6A", "A6B", "A6C", "A1", "A2", "A3", "A4", "A5", "A6", "F1", "F2", "C1", "C2", "C3"), phone number (UAE format), and any special requests for your order.

Great! I found a pepperoni pizza for AED 43.0 on our menu. Would you like to place an order for this item? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel.

If you're ready to order, please provide me with your RFID number (6 digits - located at the back bottom right of your NYU card after the + sign), building number (from the options: "A1A", "A1B", "A1C", "A2A", "A2B", "A2C", "A3", "A4", "A5A", "A5B", "A5C", "A6A", "A6B", "A6C", "A1", "A2", "A3", "A4", "A5", "A6", "F1", "F2", "C1", "C2", "C3"), phone number (UAE format), and any special requests for your order.
Great! Your RFID number is 489231. Could you please provide me with your building number and phone number (UAE format)? Also, do you have any special requests for your order?
Ok, my building number is A3A
'A3A' is not a valid building. Please choose from: A1, A1A, A1B, A1C, A2, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6, A6A, A6B, A6C, C1, C2, C3, F1, F2
Oh sorry, my building is A3

Perfect! Your building number is A3. Could you please provide me with your phone number (UAE format) and any special requests for your order? 

For your reference, the pepperoni pizza costs AED 43.0.
Your RFID must be exactly 6 digits. You provided 7 digits (5482121). Please check your RFID and provide exactly 6 digits.

Your RFID number is 489231, building number is A3, and phone number is 539032.

Could you please confirm your phone number again? It should be exactly 6 digits.

For your reference, the pepperoni pizza costs AED 43.0.
